titles: A sermon of the stewards danger preached at Paules Crosse the 15. of August by Iohn Hayward ; and now published at the earnest request of diuers well disposed.
author: Hayward, John, Sir, 1564?-1627.
publisher: Printed for Humfrey Lownes, and are to be sold at his shop at the west doore of Paules,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
